forum.name: Implementation Discussion Forum
forum.intro:
It all comes together with the actual delivery of the instruction based on all your planning, reviewing, and evaluating of the past several weeks. Do not be nervous! This is a wonderful learning opportunity for both you the teacher and your learners.

This is also a wonderful opportunity to learn from each other. So, how did it go?  Tell us about what took place during your lesson, what worked well, and what did not work.

Please spend a few moments summarizing your experience with teaching your lesson that included an OER. Also, attach your final lesson plan so your colleagues can see what you are talking about in your posting. 

For those not currently teaching:

If you are not currently teaching, there is an alternative Module 7 activity for you to do. Share your lesson plan with teachers in your program and request feedback from them on what they see as possible implementation challenges with the lesson. You can also ask them how they might revise it based on their instructional strategies and student needs since it is open!

I f your school is on spring break or you do not have access to teachers locally:

Ask one of your colleagues here in the science group or the math group if they would be willing to review your lesson and point out possible implementation challenges or suggestions.
